0. Download tropical cyclone tracks#

Description#

  • This jupyter notebook shows how to download tropical cyclone tracks downscaled from many CMIP6 models using pyTCR I/O functions.

  • TC data can be accessed at: https://web.corral.tacc.utexas.edu/setxuifl/tropical_cyclones/downscaled_cmip6_tracks.

Import libraries#

%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# pytcr modules
import tcr.iodata as tcr_io

Fetch and print the directory tree structure from the server#

max_depth = 2  # Define the maximum depth to traverse
tcr_io.fetch_directory_tree(max_depth=max_depth)

|-- historical

    |-- ACCESS-CM2
    |-- ACCESS-ESM1-5
    |-- CESM2
    |-- CESM2-WACCM
    |-- CMCC-CM2-SR5
    |-- CMCC-ESM2
    |-- CanESM5
    |-- E3SM-1-0
    |-- E3SM-1-1
    |-- E3SM-1-1-ECA
    |-- E3SM-2-0
    |-- EC-Earth3
    |-- EC-Earth3-Veg
    |-- EC-Earth3-Veg-LR
    |-- FGOALS-g3
    |-- GFDL-CM4
    |-- HadGEM3-GC31-LL
    |-- HadGEM3-GC31-MM
    |-- IITM-ESM
    |-- INM-CM4-8
    |-- INM-CM5-0
    |-- IPSL-CM6A-LR
    |-- KACE-1-0-G
    |-- MIROC6
    |-- MPI-ESM1-2-HR
    |-- MPI-ESM1-2-LR
    |-- MRI-ESM2-0
    |-- NESM3
    |-- NorESM2-LM
    |-- REANALYSIS
    |-- TaiESM1
|-- ssp585

    |-- ACCESS-CM2
    |-- ACCESS-ESM1-5
    |-- CESM2-WACCM
    |-- CMCC-CM2-SR5
    |-- CMCC-ESM2
    |-- CanESM5
    |-- E3SM-1-0
    |-- E3SM-1-1
    |-- E3SM-1-1-ECA
    |-- EC-Earth3
    |-- EC-Earth3-Veg
    |-- EC-Earth3-Veg-LR
    |-- FGOALS-g3
    |-- GFDL-CM4
    |-- HadGEM3-GC31-LL
    |-- HadGEM3-GC31-MM
    |-- IITM-ESM
    |-- INM-CM4-8
    |-- INM-CM5-0
    |-- IPSL-CM6A-LR
    |-- KACE-1-0-G
    |-- MIROC6
    |-- MPI-ESM1-2-HR
    |-- MPI-ESM1-2-LR
    |-- MRI-ESM2-0
    |-- NESM3
    |-- NorESM2-LM
    |-- TaiESM1

Download model data#

If the data is available on the local computer, skip the download. Otherwise, download the data.

# Select experiment or list of experiments to download
experiments = ['historical']

# Select model or list of models to download
models = ['E3SM-1-0', 'REANALYSIS']

# Download the data
tcr_io.download_tracks_data_cmip6(experiments=experiments, models=models)

File tracks_NA_E3SM-1-0_historical_r1i1p1f1_196401_201412.nc already exists. Skipping download.

File tracks_NA_REANALYSIS_historical_r1i1p1f1_196401_201412.nc already exists. Skipping download.
